name: Eze
headline: B2B Marketplace for new & used electronics
description:
Eze is a B2B Marketplace that connects telecommunication and global electronic wholesalers allowing them to trade devices in wholesale quantities with real-time market data. Our aim is to formalize the fragmented and inefficient second-hand electronics market that had an estimated beachhead of $17 billion in 2016 which grew 50% from 2015. (Deloitte)

Buyers and sellers use our platform to submit buy and sell requests. Eze automatically connects the two parties with compatible bids and executes the trade. The platform gives businesses real-time market prices and eliminates transaction risk by acting as an intermediary with a secure payment system.

## Get to know us better.
![profile image](https://storage.googleapis.com/ezetradein-gs-cld/Ellipse_1241.svg)
Need shopping help?
[Ask a sales rep](https://www.ezewholesale.com/<https:/wa.me/13107207302>)
![message image](https://storage.googleapis.com/ezetradein-gs-cld/gala_chat.svg)
How to use the platform?
Book a Demo
Visit Our Help Centre
How can I check the prices of products?![arrow](https://storage.googleapis.com/ezetradein-gs-cld/Group_39380_1.svg)
All the product prices are on our shop page; they can be viewed in a list or grid format for easy comparison. To find a specific product's pricing, use the search box to access its unique product page.
Do you ship internationally?![arrow](https://storage.googleapis.com/ezetradein-gs-cld/Group_39378_1.svg)
Yes, we ship to almost every country worldwide through global and local logistics partners.
What methods of payment are used?![arrow](https://storage.googleapis.com/ezetradein-gs-cld/Group_39378_1.svg)
Eze accepts Visa, MasterCard, Discover, and American Express Cards, ACH bank transfers, USDT, and Wire Payments.
Payments by check or cash are not accepted.![arrow](https://storage.googleapis.com/ezetradein-gs-cld/Group_39378_1.svg)
NB: For wire transfers, orders are processed upon payment receipt and confirmation, followed by an order confirmation email.
What's the condition of the devices sold?![arrow](https://storage.googleapis.com/ezetradein-gs-cld/Group_39378_1.svg)
We sell certified new and used devices ranked by various criteria. For details, check our grading process page
The Global Wholesale B2B Electronics MarketplaceMaking global wholesale electronics trading effortlessly simple and secure.Go to Shop

## Get to know us better.
![profile image⟨52⟩]
Need shopping help?
Ask a sales rep⟨53⟩
![message image⟨54⟩]
How to use the platform?
Book a Demo
Visit Our Help Centre
How can I check the prices of products?![arrow⟨55⟩]
All the product prices are on our shop page; they can be viewed in a list or grid format for easy comparison. To find a specific product's pricing, use the search box to access its unique product page.
Do you ship internationally?![arrow⟨56⟩]
Yes, we ship to almost every country worldwide through global and local logistics partners.
What methods of payment are used?![arrow⟨56⟩]
Eze accepts Visa, MasterCard, Discover, and American Express Cards, ACH bank transfers, USDT, and Wire Payments.
Payments by check or cash are not accepted.![arrow⟨56⟩]
NB: For wire transfers, orders are processed upon payment receipt and confirmation, followed by an order confirmation email.
What's the condition of the devices sold?![arrow⟨56⟩]
We sell certified new and used devices ranked by various criteria. For details, check our grading process page

generated_description:
**Eze Overview**

Eze is a B2B marketplace that specializes in the trade of new and used electronic devices. Launched in 2017, Eze was conceived to bridge the gap between telecommunications and global electronics wholesalers, thereby streamlining the buying and selling process for wholesale quantities of devices. Given the fragmented nature of the second-hand electronics market—estimated at $17 billion in 2016 with substantial growth—it’s clear that Eze’s mission is crucial for the industry.

### **Platform Features**

Eze operates a smart platform where buyers and sellers can submit their buy and sell requests. The system intelligently pairs compatible bids and manages transactions, eliminating risks through an intermediary secure payment system. This not only gives users real-time market pricing but also simplifies what has traditionally been a cumbersome process.

### **Current Operations**

Eze is based in San Francisco and has a team of 32 employees, highlighting its relatively compact yet agile operational structure. They are a part of the Y Combinator Batch W20, which adds significant credibility to their venture. They pride themselves on transparency and a rigorous grading process for devices, ensuring quality and reliability for their customers.

### **Key Services**

1. **Bulk Trading**: Users can buy wholesale smartphones, laptops, tablets, accessories, and more.
2. **Bidding System**: Buyers can submit offers to a vast network of sellers, aiming to maximize profit margins.
3. **Quality Assurance**: Each device undergoes a comprehensive inspection before sale.
4. **Flexible Payment Options**: Eze offers multiple payment methods and terms, including a net 120 days pay structure.
5. **Global Reach**: The marketplace caters to a worldwide audience, accessible in multiple languages and currencies.

### **B2B Marketplace Advantage**

Eze’s model is positioned to mitigate traditional transaction risks, making it easier for businesses to trade electronics securely and confidently. The platform enhances visibility into pricing dynamics, helping users make informed purchasing decisions in an ever-changing market landscape.

### **Vision and Future**

In a growing market with immense potential, Eze aims to redefine how electronics are traded globally. By formalizing this space, they’re not just improving efficiency but also fostering a marketplace that emphasizes trust and quality.

For further information or to explore their offerings, visit [Eze's website](https://www.ezewholesale.com/). They are clearly poised to impact the electronics trade market profoundly.
